There is Biber 1.9 
compatible with BibLaTeX 2.9 
coming with BaKoMa TeX beginning from V 10.50

To install it 
Donwload http://www.bakoma-tex.com/dist/x1110/fix/biber-MSWIN.zip 
then unpack into C:\BaKoMa TeX\BIN\WIN32

Clear biber temporary folder:

C:\Users\<UserName>\AppData\Local\Temp\par-42614b6f4d61 

or may be something near ...
